div.p: Teachers and administrators, come join @EdTechBCOE to learn about Google Form creation, question options, advanced settings, extras, and organization! Learn ways to share forms and understand data both in G Forms and G Sheets! Register attendance at bit.ly/DL-REGISTER! #ButteCOE view image

img.alt: Laurie York

div.p: #ButteCOE teachers, join our Educational Technology Department for Introduction to Google Slides, where you'll find all the tools you need to create student templates, learning experiences, and activities! Register at bit.ly/DL-REGISTER! @EdTechBCOE view image
